name: @react-awesome-query-builder/main
description: User-friendly query builder for React. Demo: https://ukrbublik.github.io/react-awesome-query-builder

scripts.build-all: npm run build-npm && npm run build-global && npm run build-examples && npm run build-sandbox-ts && npm run build-sandbox-js
scripts.examples: cd examples && npm i && npm start
scripts.sandbox-ts: cd sandbox && npm i && npm start
scripts.sandbox-js: cd sandbox_simple && npm i && npm start
scripts.tsc-lite: npm run tsc-lib && npm run tsc-tests
scripts.tsc: npm run tsc-lib && npm run tsc-examples && npm run tsc-sandbox && npm run tsc-tests
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run tsc
scripts.lint-lite: npm run eslint-lite && npm run tsc-lite
scripts.install-all: npm i  &&  npm i -C examples  &&  npm i -C sandbox  &&  npm i -C sandbox_simple
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean && npm run install-all
scripts.smoke: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build-all && npm run check-hot
scripts.resmoke: npm run reinstall && npm run smoke

author: Denis Oblogin <ukrbublik@gmail.com> (https://github.com/ukrbublik)
